title: DPS-BEST OF- Oct 21, 2020
itunes:title: DPS-BEST OF- Oct 21, 2020
description:
On Today's episode of the Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps Game 1 of the World Series. We finally saw the real Clayton Kershaw show up in a playoff game, how can the Dodgers build off that momentum? The Dolphins announced Tua as their starting quarterback, why now? We're joined by Bucs Head Coach Bruce Arians, NFL Network Reporter Jane Slater, ESPN MLB Analyst Jessica Mendoza and Dolphins Beat writer for the Miami Herald, Adam Beasley.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
